name: The Turtle With Cowboy Boots In: Turtle Town Roundup
name_original: The Turtle With Cowboy Boots In: Turtle Town Roundup
description:
Find the missing turtlings and uncover the mystery of the northern mountains in this short adventure made for the Winter 2023 My First Game Jam! - May take some time for the web version to load!

CONTROLS:
WASD to move
ENTER to interact

Made in 2 weeks by Motley and Yoshi in RPG Paper Maker
